ComicInfo.Summary: Night Shift [Marvel Zombies 4: Midnight Sons Part 2]: Black Talon tries to sell Simon Garth: Zombie and Deathpool (his zombie head) to The Hood and the zombie virus mutates into a superbug that is now airborne.
ComicInfo.Title: Night Shift [Marvel Zombies 4: Midnight Sons Part 2]
